plot: Based on a tale of Guy De Maupassant. Reaveals a prostitute life's in Rio and a man desperate for love. Juri's Special Award of Atlantic Film Festival - Rio 1989. Arquived at Boston Museum of Fine Arts 1993
title: O Armário
